ygData.subject: Rodcet Nife
ygData.msgSnippet: If anyone on Rodcet Nife wishes to learn Elder Tier Dal, Elvish, Dark Elvish, Dark Speech or one of my other slowly developing languages just shoot me a /tell
ygData.messageBody:
If anyone on Rodcet Nife wishes to learn Elder Tier'Dal, Elvish, Dark Elvish, Dark Speech or one of my other slowly developing languages just shoot me a /tell will teach for Necromancer items, plat, spellcaster necessities or language that I do not currently know well. I am on every day (unless something weird is up) usually after 8pm est weekdays and anytime Im awake on the weekends (Damn Verant, Damn them to hell, I want my real life back ;P ).


Sumdar Dark Elf Necromancer (Closing in on the fourth circle)
Rodcet Nife Server
